Oh okay then... See the problem is, that PowerPC macs don't have a BIOS, they use the Open Firmware to configure everything. Ubuntu doesn't know how to read open firmware settings, so it's defaulting to VGA for default video output, whereas your open firmware would be set for DVI in Mac OS X. You need to parse a command to the kernel of Ubuntu that sets the DVI as your standard output, and I don't know how to do that, maybe someone
